mutants.code:
import string

def find_longest_strings(strings):
    valid_strings = [s for s in strings if any((c.isupper() for c in s)) or any((c in string.punctuation for c in s))]
    longest_strings = sorted(valid_strings, key=len, reverse=True)[:2]
    return longest_strings

import string

def find_longest_strings(strings):
    valid_strings = [s for s in strings if any((c.isupper() for c in s)) and any((c not in string.punctuation for c in s))]
    longest_strings = sorted(valid_strings, key=len, reverse=True)[:2]
    return longest_strings
